name: Radiant Core
summary:
Created in 48hrs for Ludum Dare 35 game jam with the theme "Shapeshift"

Control a micro drone that is capable of hacking AI systems. Infiltrate a facility and destroy the brain core which controls the enemy drones. (Unfortunately, I need to rush the ending)

The game is short as I have removed some planned features and levels because of the time constraint Still, I hope you guys will enjoy playing it. :)
